title: Raid Insurance
content:
If you get raided, you are entitled to a raid insurance package as long as there is evidence you been raided.

- Regular members are entitled to Tier 1 Raid Insurance
- VIP members are entitled to Tier 2 Raid Insurance

title: Tier 1 Raid Insurance
content:
- x2 Hazmat Suit
- x2 MP5A4
- Pistol Ammo
- Medical Syringes
- Jackhammer
- Chainsaw
- Low Grade Fuel
- x3,000 Stone
- x2,000 Metal Fragments
- x2,000 Wood

title: Tier 2 Raid Insurance
content:
- x2 Full Metal Kit
- x2 Hazmat Suit
- x2 Assault Rifle
- x2 MP5A4
- 5.56 Rifle Ammo
- Pistol Ammo
- Medical Syringes
- x2 Jackhammer
- Chainsaw
- Low Grade Fuel
- x3 Garage Door
- x10,000 Stone
- x5,000 Metal Fragments
- x5,000 Wood

title: How to claim Raid Insurance
content:
You will need to <#1152707745808650321> with the following information:

- Your **OLD** Base Grid / Coordinates
- Your Xbox / PSN Username
